Change Log: `yii2-fullcalendar`
===============================

## Version 1.0.11

**Date:** 04-Jan-2018

- New fullcalendar version (3.8.0)

## Version 1.0.10

**Date:** 06-Oct-2017

**Date:** 20-Jun-2017

- Use npm instead of bower

**Date:** 30-Mar-2017

- Loosen package versions
